channel.title: [PI] Chaotic Crossbow is a MELEE WEP!?
channel.description:
Hey guys,
On my server I have a Chaotic Crossbow that does the right emote and it looks like you shoot bolts, but really it's just a melee weapon and you don't actually need bolts to use it. I'm just wondering where I can add it so the Chaotic Crossbow will be recognized as a Crossbow instead of a Melee weapon..
Thank you.
